title: BRIEF-Adtran Says Broad Based Agreement With Sumitomo Electric Industries​ For North American MSO Business
text: March 20, 2018 / 8:39 AM / Updated 36 minutes ago BRIEF-Adtran Says Broad Based Agreement With Sumitomo Electric Industries​ For North American MSO Business Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Adtran Inc: * ‍SECURED EPON BUSINESS FOR NORTH AMERICA FROM SUMITOMO ELECTRIC INDUSTRIES LTD​ * ‍SECURED TECHNOLOGY LICENSE AND OEM SUPPLY FOR NORTH AMERICA, SOUTH AMERICA, EMEA, AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND, FROM SUMITOMO ELECTRIC INDUSTRIES * ‍INCREASES MARKET LEADERSHIP IN NORTH AMERICAN MSO BUSINESS BY ENTERING BROAD BASED AGREEMENT WITH SUMITOMO ELECTRIC INDUSTRIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
